name: stephanotis
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a climbing plant with small, white, sweet-smelling flowers. It grows wild in tropical areas and is also often used as a houseplant (= a plant that is grown inside a house): In the greenhouse, she grows scented plants for the house, like stephanotis and jasmine. The bride carried a bouquet of gardenias and stephanotis.
More examplesFewer examplesClimbers scramble up the walls, with a glossy stephanotis making a frame around the entrance. The bridesmaids wore blue taffeta dresses and carried pink carnations and stephanotis.It gives off an incredibly strong stephanotis scent.
